about_the_game:
In Random Dungeon Game you must make your way through randomly generated dungeons, searching for better weapons to increase your chances against the dangers lerking around the dungeons eager to end your adventure, sending you back to your humble beginnings forced to start your adventures anew.   

 Each level will be randomly generated so that no play through will be the same. The player must find randomly placed weapons throughout the dungeon to fight off any enemies they will encounter, then they will progress to the next level by finding the portal. The portals are also placed randomly and once the player enters the portal they will be teleported to another level, with each level becoming more vast and dangerous, the player will be challenged more and more, some portals will lead to new realms where the player will encounter different environments and enemies!   

 Will you answer the call of this challenging adventure? Get ready brave knights, for you must stay vigilant if you are to defy the odds making your way from dungeon to dungeon  as you progress the dungeons will get more vast and dangerous, do you have what it takes to make it out alive?

In Random Dungeon Game you must make your way through randomly generated dungeons, searching for better weapons to increase your chances against the dangers lerking around the dungeons eager to end your adventure, sending you back to your humble beginnings forced to start your adventures anew.   

 Each level will be randomly generated so that no play through will be the same. The player must find randomly placed weapons throughout the dungeon to fight off any enemies they will encounter, then they will progress to the next level by finding the portal. The portals are also placed randomly and once the player enters the portal they will be teleported to another level, with each level becoming more vast and dangerous, the player will be challenged more and more, some portals will lead to new realms where the player will encounter different environments and enemies!   

 Will you answer the call of this challenging adventure? Get ready brave knights, for you must stay vigilant if you are to defy the odds making your way from dungeon to dungeon  as you progress the dungeons will get more vast and dangerous, do you have what it takes to make it out alive?
name: Random Dungeon Game

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: core i3-4160 3.6GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RadeonRX580 or Equivalent
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RadeonRx580 or Equivalent
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Calling all brave adventurers! Do you think you have what it takes to dive deep into a world of ever changing dungeons and come out alive? Don't be too hasty, one wrong turn and you could end up starting at the beginning again! Each adventure will be different from your last!
